title: Saeima marks four years of Russia's war against Ukraine
summary_full: Latvia's parliament, the Saeima, on February 19th adopted a statement marking four years since the launch of Russia's brutal and illegal full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
summary_public: Latvia's parliament, the Saeima, on February 19th adopted a statement marking four years since the launch of Russia's brutal and illegal full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
